      • cancelDownload

        public boolean cancelDownload(java.lang.String downloadItemCode)
        cancels a download item (from download queue) that has a specific code
        Parameters:
        downloadItemCode - current download item code
        Returns:
        true, if current download is cancelled, false otherwise (because download process is not running)

      • pauseDownloadThread

        public boolean pauseDownloadThread()
        pause download thread
        Returns:
        true, if download thread is paused, false otherwise (because download process is not running)

      • cancelAllDownloads

        public boolean cancelAllDownloads()
        cancel all downloads from download queue
        Returns:
        true, if download thread is cancelled, false otherwise (because download process is not running)

      • isDownloadProcessRunning

        public boolean isDownloadProcessRunning()
        Returns:
        true if download process is running, false otherwise
